title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 6-3.16 - Fencing/enclosure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 6-3.16 - Fencing/enclosure

State Regulations

All spray pads shall be enclosed within a fence or other barrier to prevent access by patrons and animals when the spray pad is not supervised. Access to the spray pad shall be prevented when the spray pad is not supervised. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
6-3.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
